data.name: SUPER DRINK BROS. FullMetalArmor-Skin
data.detailed_description:
『SUPER DRINK BROS.』 Full Metal Armor Skin Set!
Stoneko(Strong Japanese Liquor), Nincha(green tea), and Tamburara(tumbler) run the battlefield in cool metal armor!
The atmosphere radiated from the heavy armor is truly that of a warrior!
data.about_the_game:

data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Spain*, Russian*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10
  • Processor: Core i3-3225 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: PCではIntel HD 4000; Intel Iris Pro 5200
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
